title: Pesto, Radish, and Sea Salt Crostini
directions: Heat oven to 400° F. Place the baguette slices on a baking sheet and brush both sides of the bread with the oil. Bake until golden brown, 4 to 5 minutes per side.
Dividing evenly, spread the pesto on the toasted baguette slices, top with the radishes, and sprinkle with the salt.
